pages.title: Solo-wielding

pages.text: However some large weapons, particularly those from mods might be considered twohanded.$(br)Twohanded weapons $(thing)$(l:footwork:selfdefense/binding)bind$() your offhand when wielded, they are typically large weapons with large sweep radiuses and heavy posture damage.$(br2)However most weapons also come with a "twohanding bonus" which is engaged when a weapon is wielded with nothing in your offhand. $(o)(which naturally means twohanded weapons will always usually benefit from this)$()

A weapon can have it's twohanded bonuses checked by holding ALT while browsing a weapon's tooltips. It varies from different types and sizes of weapons. But generally confers some level of bonus damage and attack rate and maybe a hint of reach with a bonus to certain resources. $(br2)Most similar weapons of a class type $(o)(hammers, axes, katanas, swords etc)$() will typically share a similar twohanding bonus.
